rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Garage Access
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading to a two-car garage. The design incorporates Vastu principles by placing the main entrance in the south-east for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living area that seamlessly integrates with the kitchen, featuring large windows facing west to capitalize on natural light while adhering to local norms and Vastu principles for family well-being. The space is designed to serve as a gathering area.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-plan kitchen adjacent to the living area, with efficient work triangle layout and modern fixtures. The design follows Vastu guidelines by placing the cooking area in the southeast portion of the home.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A private master bedroom located on the ground floor for accessibility, with a walk-in closet and attached bathroom. Positioned in the north-west to promote restful sleep according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom offering comfort and privacy. The room is designed with ample storage space and a functional layout, adhering to cultural aesthetics of Chettinad style.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned in the south-east as per Vastu guidelines to invite positive energy and ensure a welcoming environment.
Large windows are strategically placed in the west-facing walls for maximum natural light, ensuring ventilation and adhering to local norms.
Wide garage doors providing easy access to the two-car garage, designed with secure locking mechanisms.
